belongs_to_collection.name: Hontou ni Atta Toukou Yami Eizou

original_title: 本当にあった　投稿　闇映像６
overview: The 6th installment of the documentary series that investigates the bizarre lurking in the back-alleys of everyday life, caught on cellphones and surveillance cameras. Included in this ultimate collection of horror videos, the gaze of the vengeful spirit hidden behind anti-social behaviour, "Restructuring contractor", "Transfer fraud"

production_companies.name: Posts That Really Happened Darkness Video Production Committee

title: Hontou ni Atta Toukou Yami Eizou 6
